Others: Ruturaj Gaikwad has been ruled out of the T20I series against New Zealand due to a wrist injury.
Gaikwad filed a complaint with the BCCI following a Ranji Trophy match.
Gaikwad has been sent to the National Cricket Academy in Bengaluru for rehabilitation.
India's Ishan Kishan and Shubman Gill are expected to open in the first T20I on Friday.
Jadeja had knee surgery last year and hasn't played for India since August.
